title: Gato Egg
summaries: The Gato Egg is a pet-summoning item that summons a Propeller Gato to follow the player around. The Gato Egg is dropped by Dark Mages during the Old One's Army event, with a 1/6 (16.67%) / 1/4 (25%) chance during Tier 1, and a 1/12 (8.33%) chance during Tier 3.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC
